Thanks for the update. Would you like to stay on our list for future webinars?
Steve
From: Philip Brzezinski [mailto:pbrzezinski@accelatis.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2012 4:46 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Phil Berzezinski
Steve,
Thanks for reaching out. Next month I am transitioning from being a 1099 to a full-time employee.
Regards,
Phil
Philip Brzezinski | VP Bus Dev | Accelatis, LLC phone: 203.518.1610 | email: pbrzezinski@accelatis.com
Ascension Suite | www.accelatis.com Infrastructure Management, System Monitoring and Performance Optimization for your Oracle Hyperion environment.

From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 31, 2012 2:50 PM To: pbrzezinski@accelatis.com Subject: MBO Partners / Phil Berzezinski
Hello Phil,
I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going.
We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know!
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards, Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: (703) 793-6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
